attributes.action: NO MORE TO BANKS  HELP THE REAL PEOPLE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to goverment to instead of giving the money to banks but to pay off any loans, credi card etc to the amount of £30,000 to help us spend more in the shops, this will be more helpfull to the shops, us, our children.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
